properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 15 at 4:08AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Lakeshore Flood Advisory, which is in effect from 7 PM EST /6 PM
CST/ this evening to 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ Thursday. The Lakeshore
Flood Watch is no longer in effect.

* LAKE SHORE FLOODING...Southwest winds 10 to 20 mph Wednesday
afternoon will shift northwest and increase to 15 to 25 mph by
Wednesday evening and continue into midday Thursday, then
diminish Thursday afternoon. Some gusts to 30 mph are possible
late Wednesday night into early Thursday morning. Waves of 4 to
8 feet.

* TIMING...Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong northwest winds and high wave action are
expected. This will likely lead to additional beach erosion and
minor lakeshore flooding along the immediate lakeshore.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THURSDAY
